text:
Ah. Hmm, okay it's actually three packages, a core, a main package and an application, with dependencies Core -> Main -> App.
When the App `dev` 's the main (which then devs the core, right?), it says `ERROR: LoadError: ArgumentError: Package Influenza does not have InfluenzaCore in its dependencies:`
